ConceptDef.label: Creating Beeswax
ConceptDef.helpText: Bees wax can be produced by Apini at a crafting spot.

ConceptDef.label: Creating Honey
ConceptDef.helpText: Delicous honey is produced from pollen harvested from frostbells. The pollen is placed in a honey capsule and ferments into honey.\nThe ideal number of frostbell plants is 25-75, depending on the size of the colony.
